name: Game Dev Survival
description:
In this game you press buttons until a game comes out and then sell the game and make money.

You then buy food and pay your taxes with said money.

You then make another game to make more money and so on.

This game is meant to be a totally realistic representation of the game development process.

Credit for the pixel font used in game, found both on itch.io or the Unity Asset Store:

https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059
